title: Platform Overview
content: This platform provides structured technical learning paths including Azure services, KQL, SRE, DTDL, DSA and more. Each course includes modules, examples and practical knowledge.

title: KQL Course
content: The KQL course covers fundamentals of Kusto Query Language, operators, filtering, aggregation, joins, time-series analysis and real-world log analytics scenarios.

title: SRE Course
content: The SRE course explains reliability engineering principles, SLOs, SLIs, incident management, monitoring strategies and production best practices.
